mapper.select: SELECT sign_in_id AS 'signInId', sign_in_time AS 'signInTime', sign_in_status AS 'signInStatus' FROM rc_signin_record JOIN rc_student on rc_student.student_id = rc_signin_record.student_id JOIN rc_teacher on re_teacher.teacher_id = rc_signin_record.teacher_id WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND sign_in_time IS NOT NULL AND sign_in_status IS NOT NULL
